channel.title: Every time i run a client [ANY CLIENT] I get this error. .. help
channel.description:
As you all may kno, I'm a VERY old member of moparscape, i quit for a while and made a wow p server, it failed. im back but now when i try to run ANY client, it gives me this error: [IMG]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u92/alex4sizzl/Untitled-3.jpg[/img]
can anyone help me?

item.title: Every time i run a client [ANY CLIENT] I get this error. .. help
item.dc:creator: @geterperez geterperez
item.description:
@geterperez wrote:

[quote=“decrepify, post:4, topic:274299”]I have jdk 13 what do you mean by change the jdk and jre in the actual client, in what file do i go into

Right click Run.bat and click edit and it’ll come up with a list of things…
One or two of em will be jdk1.6.0_##. change it to jdk1.6.0_13
If this works can ya rep me

-Decrepify[/quote]

the client im trying to use sais nothing liek that, altho i have seen some like that, but the one im using sais

@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 19, 2009, 12:59:47 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for double post, but can anyone PLEASE help me …

Read full topic

item.title: Every time i run a client [ANY CLIENT] I get this error. .. help
item.dc:creator: @decrepify decrepify
item.description:
@decrepify wrote:

I have jdk 13 what do you mean by change the jdk and jre in the actual client, in what file do i go into
[/quote]

Right click Run.bat and click edit and it’ll come up with a list of things…
One or two of em will be jdk1.6.0_##. change it to jdk1.6.0_13
If this works can ya rep me

-Decrepify

Read full topic

item.title: Every time i run a client [ANY CLIENT] I get this error. .. help

item.description:
@geterperez wrote:

[quote=“decrepify, post:2, topic:274299”]Have you changed the jdk and jre in the actual client? I had this problem and i downloaded the most recent jdk and jre there was and it worked fine for me
Sorry i cant be of more help…[/quote]

I have jdk 13 what do you mean by change the jdk and jre in the actual client, in what file do i go into

item.title: Every time i run a client [ANY CLIENT] I get this error. .. help
item.dc:creator: @decrepify decrepify
item.description:
@decrepify wrote:

[quote=“geterperez, post:1, topic:274299”]As you all may kno, I’m a VERY old member of moparscape, i quit for a while and made a wow p server, it failed. im back but now when i try to run ANY client, it gives me this error:

Untitled-3.jpg1024×819

Have you changed the jdk and jre in the actual client? I had this problem and i downloaded the most recent jdk and jre there was and it worked fine for me
Sorry i cant be of more help…

-Decrepify

can anyone help me?[/quote]
